thread.title: Ready for Blast Off: UPike men and women to debut Wednesday
thread.title_full: Ready for Blast Off: UPike men and women to debut Wednesday

title: Ready for Blast Off: UPike men and women to debut Wednesday
text:
Ready for Blast Off: UPike men and women to debut Wednesday Posted: Tue 10:33 PM, Oct 20, 2015 / Headlines List / Article 
PIKEVILLE, Ky. -- After weeks of practice behind closed doors, the University of Pikeville men’s and women’s basketball teams are ready for their debut with a fun night of activities planned for the annual Basketball Blast-Off at 7:30 p.m. ET on Wednesday at UPIKE Gym. 
There will be free food, performances by the UPIKE spirit teams and band, along with numerous fan contests including a dance off and 3-point shootout. 
The basketball teams are scheduled to be introduced starting at 9 p.m. with the women, followed by the UPIKE men at 9:30. 
Regular-season play is right around the corner for both programs. Head coach Kelly Wells’ men host Central Pennsylvania at 7 p.m. on Monday at the East Ky. Expo Center, while Joanna McNamee and her women’s program kick things off on Nov. 3 against Midway also at the expo.
